definitions.text: an interpretation of a matter from a particular viewpoint
examples: his version of the fight was different from mine

definitions.text: something a little different from others of the same type
examples: an experimental version of the night fighter
a variant of the same word
an emery wheel is the modern variation of a grindstone
the boy is a younger edition of his father

definitions.text: a written work (as a novel) that has been recast in a new form
examples: the play is an adaptation of a short novel

definitions.text: a written communication in a second language having the same meaning as the written communication in a first language
a mental representation of the meaning or significance of something
manual turning of a fetus in the uterus (usually to aid delivery)
